DocAttribute.Name: PredefinedType
DocAttribute.Documentation: Identifies the predefined type of a mooring device. This type may associate additional specific property sets. NOTE The PredefinedType shall only be used, if no _IfcMooringDeviceType_ is assigned, providing its own IfcMooringDeviceType.PredefinedType.

DocWhereRule.Name: CorrectPredefinedType
DocWhereRule.Documentation: Either the _PredefinedType_ attribute is unset(e.g. because an _IfcMooringDeviceType_ is associated), or the inherited attribute _ObjectType_ shall be provided, if the _PredefinedType_ is set to USERDEFINED.
DocWhereRule.Expression: NOT(EXISTS(PredefinedType)) OR (PredefinedType <> IfcMooringDeviceTypeEnum.USERDEFINED) OR ((PredefinedType = IfcMooringDeviceTypeEnum.USERDEFINED) AND EXISTS(SELF\IfcObject.ObjectType))

DocWhereRule.Name: CorrectTypeAssigned
DocWhereRule.Documentation: Either there is no type object associated, i.e. the _IsTypedBy_ inverse relationship is not provided, or the associated type object has to be of type _IfcMooringDeviceType_.
